about_the_game:
This demo includes three levels, three aircraft and full aircraft mod support.

Welcome to ExoSky, a groundbreaking flight simulation set in a future where AI has colonized the solar system. Join an AI, manifested as a whimsical cat, on its mission to create the ultimate autopilot. Your role? Perform awe-inspiring stunts and navigate through a world where technology and imagination collide.

Key Features:

  • Futuristic World Setting: Set in a virtual simulation, embark on a unique journey alongside an AI with a grand vision.
  • Thrilling, Skill-Based Gameplay: ExoSky rewards pilots for flying dangerously. Score points by executing daring maneuvers and pushing the limits of your flying abilities. Exosky was designed to reward flying skill instead of shooting ability or systems management.
  • Explore Tech-Inspired Levels: Navigate through 8+ levels, each meticulously designed around computer components. From the micro-world of CPUs to the vast landscapes of GPUs, each level offers a distinct, surreal experience.
  • Surreal Landscapes: Experience the unexpected, like flying across a video card submerged underwater accompanied by a giant turtle and other fantastical scenarios.
  • Moddable Aircraft Support: ExoSky goes beyond the game. With full support for creating your own custom, moddable aircraft, the sky is literally the limit. Check out the website for a full modding tutorial, toolset and an extra aircraft!
  • Realistic Flight Physics: The game features flight physics that respond to each aircraft's geometry, propeller shape, per-wing airfoil and more; offering an authentic and challenging flight experience.
  • Multi-Atmospheric Support: Ever wonder what it would be like to fly on Mars or Venus or under water on Europa? Exosky supports more than just Earth-standard atmosphere; go where your mind takes you!

    About ExoSky:

    Crafted by a licensed pilot, ExoSky is not just a game; it's an adventure that blends realistic flight simulation with the thrill of aerobatic challenges. Navigate through tech-inspired stages, from CPUs to GPUs, in 10 unique aircraft. With its focus on flying finesse over combat or systems management, ExoSky is a testament to the beauty and complexity of skilled piloting.

    Embark on Your Flight:

    Are you ready to take to the skies and assist an AI in achieving its dream? ExoSky invites you to an adventure where technology and flight intersect in the most imaginative ways.
